Package
Description
fr.cnrs.iees.omugi.graph
The core interfaces of the omugi library: graph, node, edge, etc.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Edge
    Node.connectTo​(Direction direction, Node node)
    Connects this node to the node argument and return the resulting edge (will instantiate an edge), according to specified direction.
    default Edge
    Node.connectTo​(Direction direction, Node node, ReadOnlyPropertyList edgeProperties)
    Connects this node to the node argument and return the resulting edge (will instantiate an edge), according to specified direction, adding the property list to the edge (if compatible with the EdgeFactory used to instantiate the edge).
    void
    Node.connectTo​(Direction direction, Collection<? extends Node> nodes)
    Connects this node to a list of other nodes.
    int
    Node.degree​(Direction direction)
    The number of edges connected to this node (= degree) in the IN or OUT direction.
    void
    Connected.disconnectFrom​(Direction direction, Node node)
    Disconnects this connected element (node or edge) from the node passed as argument.
    Collection<? extends Edge>
    Node.edges​(Direction direction)
    Read-only accessor to edges according to direction.
    Collection<? extends Node>
    Node.nodes​(Direction direction)
    Read-only accessor to the nodes connected to this node, following direction.
    Collection<? extends Node>
    Connected.traversal​(int distance, Direction direction)
    As traversal(), but following only one direction from the starting connected element (node or edge) and stopping after distance recursion steps.
    default Collection<? extends Node>
    Connected.traversal​(Direction direction)
    As traversal(), but following only one direction from the starting connected element (edge or node).
